summary:
The Chicago Outfit is a powerful crime group, part of the Italian-American Mafia, based in Chicago. It started in 1910 and gained control during the 1920s with leaders Johnny Torrio and Al Capone. They fought for power during Prohibition, selling illegal alcohol. The Outfit is involved in many illegal activities and has been led by bosses like Paul Ricca and Tony Accardo.

Although not the only crime group in Chicago, it is the biggest and most violent. Its influence spread across the US, but it has been declining since the 1990s due to increased police attention. It still operates in Chicago and the Midwest today.
title: Chicago Outfit
